About the Company: National Plastic Inds. Ltd. was incorporated in 1987, a part of National group of company is engaged in the manufacture of moulded furniture. The company is an ISO-9002 accredited company. They have a diversified product mix of plastic crates, house wares, molded furniture, custom moldings, and sanitary wares sold under the brand name National Plastic; and the Touchwood brand of wooden furniture products comprising of TV trolleys, computer trolleys, shoe racks, and wall units. The company offers a choice of over 60 models to suit all applications and all kinds of budgets. They also produce plastic crates for the beverage industry, which includes customers like Pepsi, Coca-Cola, and Cadbury Schweppes.
